MasterSetupMapping._description: Setup basic relation between masters. Currently every additional master is interpreted as an axis. A Top-Level-Axes setup will be included in the next version.
MasterSetupMapping._syntax: ['parent_value'[optional: x,y],'master_value'[optional: x,y], ['child master one', 'child master two', ...]

_info.description: MasterName, Map_0/[x_0, x_1], Map_1/[y_0, y_1], ['Child(s)'], Instance Math, Characters Changed [[180,150],[180,150]] Ascender 1536 Descender -416 Regular: stroke-values of original ttf supplied via googlefonts

InstancesSetup._description: Instance Setup with Instance name, master-axis and vlaue. Names starting with '#' mark local interpolations with a defined character scope ('_Scope'). Generally, nmes starting with underscore are getting ignored while processing the follwoing data. Only the following names are interpreted as variables: '_base_setting', '_Scope', '_Custom_Parameter'.

#All._description: This setting gets applied to all other Instances as a basis setup
